sourceOrganization.name: NIAID CIVICs Network
sourceOrganization.abstract: Collaborative Influenza Vaccine Innovation Centers (CIVICs) is a network of research centers working collaboratively to develop next-generation influenza vaccines. Their goal is to create vaccines that provide broader, longer-lasting protection against influenza viruses.
sourceOrganization.description: Collaborative Influenza Vaccine Innovation Centers (CIVICs) is a network of research centers that will work together in a coordinated, multidisciplinary effort to develop more durable, broadly protective and longer-lasting influenza vaccines. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/civics
